text: Double Jeopardy is a 1999 American German Canadian crime thriller movie directed by Bruce Beresford and starring Ashley Judd, Tommy Lee Jones, Bruce Greenwood, Annabeth Gish, Roma Maffia, Jay Brazeau, Michael Gaston, Brian Croucher. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1999 crime movies Category:1999 thriller movies Category:1990s crime thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:German crime movies Category:German thriller movies Category:Canadian crime movies Category:Canadian thriller movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Bruce Beresford Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies about miscarriage of justice Category:Movies set in Washington (state) Category:Movies set in the San Francisco Bay Area
title: Double Jeopardy (1999 movie)
